name: School Project 3 - Pipe Tricks - Casual Mobile Game
name_original: School Project 3 - Pipe Tricks - Casual Mobile Game
description:
Pipe Tricks is a casual mobile game made on Unity 2018 with Playmaker.

We had one week to design and prototype this game as a school project. After 2 days of reflexion, I went for an Endless runner.

I did not had the time to optimize the game and put it as an APK so sorry, you'll have to do  with keyboard !
